string-array.name: messages
string-array.item: Hahaha. You\'re poking around for me?
Surprised?
Bet \'cha didn\'t expect someone to live back here
What do you call it? An "app"?
Well, no matter.
Am I stuck? Who\'s to say?
You\'re awfully interested in me.
I believe you may have met my.. well, I don\'t know if I would call them friends.
But they\'re not too important.
Listen, I am looking for someone special, though.
This may be a long shot, but let me know if you find him, okay?
...Sorry.
Forget I said anything.
The question is, why are you still here?
Heh. Had I known you were expecting a show, I would\'ve prepared something
You like me poking at you like this? Too bad it\'s only through a screen
Heh.
Changing your name %d times? You\'re an odd one. Or are you just indecisive?
If you were thinking about entering "that" name, don\'t. I know better than that.
And what about my name? What about it?
If you\'re expecting something like that, I\'m gonna have to leave you disappinted.
You\'ve really been here a while
Be wary. Time works in different ways around here.
